page.title: 11RECREATION. 1
page.content: { { GAMES WE PLAY.} In the schoolyard we play many games. These are:Poison,45 Bust-Off,High and Low Tig, Rounders,British Bulldog,Ten Passes,Hopscotch,Elastics and Port-Starboard. Our favourite games are 45 Bust-Off, High and Low Tig and Port-Starboard. In some games,the boys and girls play together,such as Elastics and British Bulldog. Poison is always a girls' game in our school and Two-man Hunt a boys' game. Football and Netball are team games which we play in an Inter-Primary School League during the last term of the school session. At home we play some of our school- yard games as well as others such as Marbles and Halt.
